argumentText:
ARGUMENT
l

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | isclat.b | |- B = ( Base ` K ) |
| 2 |  | isclat.u | |- U = ( lub ` K ) |
| 3 |  | isclat.g | |- G = ( glb ` K ) |
| 4 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( l = K -> ( lub ` l ) = ( lub ` K ) ) |
| 5 | 4, 2 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( l = K -> ( lub ` l ) = U ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_dmeqd | |- ( l = K -> dom ( lub ` l ) = dom U ) |
| 7 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( l = K -> ( Base ` l ) = ( Base ` K ) ) |
| 8 | 7, 1 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( l = K -> ( Base ` l ) = B ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_pweqd | |- ( l = K -> ~P ( Base ` l ) = ~P B ) |
| 10 | 6, 9 | #P_eqeq12d | |- ( l = K -> ( dom ( lub ` l ) = ~P ( Base ` l ) <-> dom U = ~P B ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( l = K -> ( glb ` l ) = ( glb ` K ) ) |
| 12 | 11, 3 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( l = K -> ( glb ` l ) = G ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_dmeqd | |- ( l = K -> dom ( glb ` l ) = dom G ) |
| 14 | 13, 9 | #P_eqeq12d | |- ( l = K -> ( dom ( glb ` l ) = ~P ( Base ` l ) <-> dom G = ~P B ) ) |
| 15 | 10, 14 | #P_anbi12d | |- ( l = K -> ( ( dom ( lub ` l ) = ~P ( Base ` l ) /\ dom ( glb ` l ) = ~P ( Base ` l ) ) <-> ( dom U = ~P B /\ dom G = ~P B ) ) ) |
| 16 |  | #P_df-clat | |- CLat = { l e. Poset | ( dom ( lub ` l ) = ~P ( Base ` l ) /\ dom ( glb ` l ) = ~P ( Base ` l ) ) } |
| 17 | 15, 16 | #P_elrab2 | |- ( K e. CLat <-> ( K e. Poset /\ ( dom U = ~P B /\ dom G = ~P B ) ) ) |
